content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)

### Furnace for iron plate production at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position y1) that processes iron ore into iron plates
- Inserter (position z1) that extracts iron plates from the furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing resources
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are gathered before attempting to craft an item. For example, iron plates are required to craft iron gear wheels, and they cannot be crafted if the furnace is not operational.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. For instance, ensure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into a furnace.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has items to extract before attempting to extract them. If the furnace inventory is empty, the extraction will fail.

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient crafting machines
- Verify that you have the necessary crafting machines available and operational to produce the required items. If a crafting machine is needed and not present, crafting will fail.
